post_text: So it’s been a while since I’ve posted anything on here, but I had a particularly strange dream last night. The premise seemed entirely non sequitur; some people I was with, of whom I didn’t know, wanted to plant sod right on the beach by the waterline of this lake. Why? I have no idea. The lake was infested with alligators, you could see them floating everywhere like deadwood. One of the people I was with attempted turning the soil over by the edge of the water, and was promptly jolted back by a lunging alligator. This deterred us for sometime. But then, the scene changed. Suddenly I was in the water, not just on top of the water, but swimming deep underneath. I found myself all the way at the bottom, inside an underwater cave. At this moment, I began to see a shark moving towards me. It was blocking my way out. I knew if I was going to survive, something drastic needed to take place right then. Strangely enough, I morphed into a shark myself. I remember thinking to myself at this moment, “but he’s been a shark all his life, he could surely best me, so what do I do?” I made the decision at this point, to charge directly at the circling shark with no hesitation and all the faux confidence I could muster. When I did so, the shark turned his side to flee, now perpendicular to me, and I rammed directly into his blindside. This startled him more than enough, and I escaped the cave from which I was corned in. I get the jist of the narrative, but I’m confused as to whatever symbolism lies behind. I searched the web for shark symbolism, especially to do with dreaming, and none of it resonated with how I felt in the dream. Maybe it’s just, “sometimes the only way to defeat a bloodthirsty shark is to become one yourself”. Thanks everyone for any input you have. Strange night...
comment_text:
I had a friend who dreamt similar dream imagery and at the time he was dealing will a large money loan and considering starting a business.

Planting grass next to the bank afraid of the dead wood that may attack him and pull him under. I would be very interested to know what you may be approaching in your life that is causing a similar fear response?

post_text: Dream (early 1990's) - I find myself standing in from of a male version of myself. Being single, I go into my "seduction mode" - the male version says "Mauny, it's not about THAT!". At that moment, the two of us go up into the air in what I can only describe as an ascending 'helix' - like a strand of DNA, twisting around each other. The next moment I am with a cloaked, shorter figure that I know as "Old Master" . He leads me into a cave and there we look down on what looks like a massive chess board, black and white squares, where figures of men are moving about the board. I know this is a 'global game' and ask Old Master what this is. He says "You will find out". At this point I literally TRIP (like when you trip over a door jamb) back awake, in my own bed. My only feeling/thought was "wow, what was that!" - it was so real!
comment_text:
DNA helix = your spinal cord

Started at the base of your spine. Seduction mode sexuality.

Physically that’s where your sexual origins reside.
The base of your spine.

You came in contact with your animus and he provoked your sexuality to be elevated and travel up your spine to the base of your skull.

The cloaked short old master is your brain stem

My guess is this “short old master” has a reptilian characteristic to him kind of like Yoda from Star Wars.

The reptilian brain leads you into your cave where you can see the game. Reptiles don’t play.
Mammals do play.

Your observing the mammals game the mammalian brain.

Finally you trip.

The trip over the threshold is the third eye pineal gland (witch is apart of the mammalian brain) reaching your frontal lobe.

You wake up and have a question.
Verbal response frontal lobe personality.

As human beings we are given the chance to not only express our base desires “subduction mode” but also question those base desires question the whole game in general.

post_text:
I am wondering if anyone has any thoughts on this dream I had tonight.
I am sorting things on my grandmother's dining table, moving them from a cardboard box into a large trunk. Grandmother has died, and this is either my inheritance, or things that were already mine but kept in her house. My parents are packing up and sorting things in other parts of the house. When my father asks me if I am ready to leave, I ask for more time. He takes note of my short black skirt and asks if it is new. I answer that it is. All of my clothing is black, possibly because I am in mourning. He then goes off to some other part of the house to continue his sorting. I am sitting down on the floor to continue looking at the various objects, loosing myself in memories. My skirt is now a a short red kilt. I adjust my thick black stockings, pulling them up over my knees, more for warmth than anything else. One of the objects I remember is a dark wooden statue of St. Peter holding a key, which I have in fact inherited from my grandmother in waking life. It used to stand in her living room.
When my father comes back a couple of hours later, he is noticeable annoyed that I am taking so much time. He is almost done sorting and packing. I tell him that I am now done and we can go. He can either drive me home, or I can take the subway. As he drives me to their house, he continues ranting about how much time I took. At the time we have reached my parents house, I have had enough and start shouting at him that he didn’t have to wait for me. He could just have gone home if he wanted, but now he has gotten more done today than expected, so he should thank me rather than complain. He now looks confused and asks me we he should be grateful to me.
I wake up and my cat walks over my chest.
As I fall asleep again, I am standing in front of a huge door. I am in a city together with some students. I open the door and enter into a relatively small room. The walls appear to be covered in dark red leather. I know that I am here to see the Queen. As I am waiting to be shown into the next room, I become very self-conscious about the short skirt I am wearing (a miniskirt in dark green leather), and check that it covers me from behind as well. I exit the room through a door to my right. Now I am in a museum of history, together with the students, showing them around an exhibition with black-and-white photographs.
comment_text:
I don’t know what your dream means but here are a couple of observations:
In your dream(s) you’re spending time involved with the past (with memories of your Grandmother and the history museum).
Your Grandmother & the Queen may symbolize the same entity/person.
Your concern over your outfits may signify your desire for approval from your Grandmother/
Queen or others.
Being a guide at the museum; your unconscious may be informing your conscious mind that you are a direct link between those things in the past and the present.

Hope this helps.

comment_text:
Interesting dream, we note the 3 different dress colours, black, red and green, also the use and mention of the word “time” and finally the wooden statue of St. Peter with the key in his hand.

THE SHORT BLACK DRESS
In your dream your grandmother has died and while reflecting on her life you are caused to reflect on your own life through your father who is also sorting and packing in the same house.
As you sort through looking for your own things and perhaps anything from your grandmother and reflect on the articles your father approached you and asks you “if you are ready yet” in other words you should be ready by now because you’ve had enough time?He does manage to cause you to become self conscious when he points out that “you are wearing a new short black dress.
Maybe your father represents God and tries to point out that you cannot fully respect the dead the way you are dressed baring too much skin
The cardboard box is lifeless and may represent your grandmother or the religion she is connected to?
The trunk is possibly you, the natural timber still alive with a larger capacity to store things
You are dressed in black for morning the death of your grandmother and take your time to absorb what she may be passing on to you? The new dress may be a new experience for you, death what does it really mean?
Contained within the articles are things meant for you but to understand exactly what they are and what they mean you need “time” to reflect on the articles.
But now your father wants to go and he asks you “are you ready to leave” But you are definitely not ready to leave “and ask him for more time”
At this point he notices your “short black skirt” possibly suggesting that even though you are dressed as for morning you are not that serious, but as you sort through and reflect you actually do start to become serious about it. Here we notice your “short skirt” it does at first seem respectable enough but as your father noticeably points out it’s “short” makes you more self conscious and aware especially since you are in the reflecting mode and now you start to question yourself. Your life up to now has been short and there has been no time to reflect upon it until now. Your fathers observation has pricked your conscience suggesting your behaviour is irreverent. Before you never had time however the death of your grandmother affords you the necessary time you need to reflect on your short life and perhaps if you are patient and take more “time” and see if you can find some answers within your grandmothers things. The cardboard box has things you need to look at.The dinning table is a place to gather, your thoughts and share emotions and of reflect on life. This is important now and you realise by the way you are dressed your father might be right? You realise you need more “time” time to find answers and time to reflect and time to find the goodness within your grandmother.
At your request your father goes off to continue packing so as to give you more “time”
I will continue tomorrow.

One of the objects I remember is a dark wooden statue of St. Peter holding a key, which I have in fact inherited from my grandmother in waking life. It used to stand in her living room.
When my father comes back a couple of hours later, he is noticeable annoyed that I am taking so much time. He is almost done sorting and packing. I tell him that I am now done and we can go. He can either drive me home, or I can take the subway. As he drives me to their house, he continues ranting about how much time I took. At the time we have reached my parents house, I have had enough and start shouting at him that he didn’t have to wait for me. He could just have gone home if he wanted, but now he has gotten more done today than expected, so he should thank me rather than complain. He now looks confused and asks me we he should be grateful to me.
I wake up and my cat walks over my chest.
As I fall asleep again, I am standing in front of a huge door. I am in a city together with some students. I open the door and enter into a relatively small room. The walls appear to be covered in dark red leather. I know that I am here to see the Queen. As I am waiting to be shown into the next room, I become very self-conscious about the short skirt I am wearing (a miniskirt in dark green leather), and check that it covers me from behind as well. I exit the room through a door to my right. Now I am in a museum of history, together with the students, showing them around an exhibition with black-and-white photographs.

post_text:
Hey there everyone, I'm looking for some help interpreting an element of a dream I just had. After walking up a long set of stairs, I reached a road and a bird came down and attacked a small snake hiding in some short grass. At first it looked like the bird had the snake, but the snake twisted out and got free. The bird attacked again, and this time the snake bit the bird as they were struggling. The bird dropped the snake, and the snake bit me, before the bird grabbed it again. I was initially worried, as I've encountered snakes a lot in my last job, but then realised it was probably too small to hurt me. I didn't recognise the species of bird or snake, but the snake wasnt big (30-40cm).

Penny for your thoughts?
comment_text:
A bird wrestling a snake is an archetypal image. A wing-thing contending with a dirt-thing evokes the cosmic battle between good and evil. It’s represented on the Mexican flag, for example.

What was the feeling tone of the dream?

comment_text:
The stairs allow you to move from one level to another level, in this case it might mean ascending to a spiritual level since you arrive at the road on top of the stairs. The road takes you on a pathway to a new place however it’s the journey that is highlighted here.
Your dream and your comments reveal 2 figures who have some understanding about snakes.
You have said that “I’ve encountered snakes in my last job”
As well the bird in her job also encounters snakes in her job.
The bird knows her job with snakes well. She doesn’t muck around she attacks the seemingly small snake 3 times. Let’s look. Firstly she reveals the snake “hiding in the grass” the bird takes no chances she will either eat the snake or act protectively since she knows the snake is a threat to her family.
You on the other hand look at the snake and because of its small size deem it harmless. Note the difference between you and the bird.
The next thing we notice is what happens in the pursuing 3 attacks. On the first attack the birds keen eye for danger reveals the hiding place of the snake “the short grass” which is beside the road you use to take this new journey. The short grass suggests it’s drought resistant quality however not quite enough coverage to escape the keen eyesight of the bird who is always on guard.
The bird is teaching you what to look for and how to behave on your journey since the small size does not cause her to see the snake as harmless.
The bird attacks the first time but the snake by changing its shape manages to find a way out of the birds beak. The snakes is adaptable firstly hiding in short grass then when cornered simply twisting itself or changes its shape to release itself.
The second attack is different, the bird and the snake struggle but the “harmless snake” actually bites the bird causing the bird to drop the snake in front of you. Now the snake is fully exposed right in front of your eyes and what does it do, it now bites you because as as the bird is a threat so too are you a potential threat but unlike the bird you still see the snake as harmless until you also get bitten. So I said the bird is teaching you not to see the small snake as entirely harmless. The bird attacks the snake for the third time after having bitten both of you and still the struggle goes on.
In your last job, before you climbed the stairs you worked with snakes enough to know that small snakes don’t pose a real threat however after you climb to the staircase you still apply the same logic in the same old way but the behaviour of the bird now teaches you something new, that is in your new life journey you might consider that even small snakes can hide in short grass and still have the capacity to bite especially once they are exposed.

post_text:
“Feminism has driven women to their animus, into a compensatory behavior. Imitating men, behaving in brutal, in animus-like ways because they have no self-assurance within their own femininity.
Jung was really struck when he was in Southern India, which is matriarchal in their basic structure.
The women are beautiful, full of dignity going around in their saris. There, it’s a bit too much on the other side.
In every big family, the grandmother sits at the top of the table, and rules the whole thing. There, the women are proud of themselves, and bare themselves beautifully.
And with us, you have to try to be as much as possible a man to be halfway recognized.
The only thing to do is to get the animus out of the way and the rest comes by itself.
Then femininity recovers by itself in a natural way.” — Marie-Louise von Franz, Remember Jung, 1977
comment_text:
I never had a problem with tomboys when I was in elementary school, and I never had a problem with women in the workplace or any of that. It just seems normal and common sense. I'm all about "female-empower
ment" for what it's worth.

But at the same time I really do see this shit happening on a grand scale. So many women are obsessed with their masculine side that it's almost like they're deliberately repressing their feminine side. It's almost like the toxic masculinity exists as a conflict between those two energies in themselves, and they just shadow-project onto the men around them.

There are several archetypes we can embody. Going to greek/roman mythologie we have Venus, The Moon, Mars, the Sun. Venus is the sensual, enjoyment of life, attraction of what I want and need (one way to see Venus incarnated are flowers). Mars is the complement of Venus, I go get my goals, I go fight for what I want, agression, impulse, courage. We have the sun, I shine, I allow myself to be who I am, I materialize my needs. The moon, i nurture, I protect, i manage and protect my emotions, i am safe place. With the birth and expansion of Abrahamic religions with all the good they brought they also came with baggage, part of it is that these archetypes were restricted to men and women. Men were allowed and encouraged to embody the Mars and Sun archetypes but not the Venus and Moon archetypes. Women were limited to the moon archetype, that is Mary. I nurture, i am the safe place where others grow from. It is a beautiful archetype but not the only one. Venus was casted away and feared for the power the release of sensuality and the power of attraction women can have on men.

Men AND women need to embody abd integrate these four archetypes. The limitations women faced and the restriction to only the moon/Mary archetype generated over centuries a rejection of that archetype and a longing for the counter part which is Mars.

All in all I think we can understand why the behavior of radical feminism has taken some of the shape it has. Our society still has miles to walk for men to embody also the moon archetype, the nurturing, emotional and I provide safety part of themselves, and to learn to manage themselves when women are allowed to fully embody the Venus archetype. All in all i believe understanding the effect that repression has had on both areas is key to constructive conversation as oppossed to feminists are all angry and just project and blabla...

post_text:
A scene from a dream I had while taking a nap today..

I was on a large flat shipping container type vessel, on a calm sea heading towards an unseen shore somewhere. I was on top of its load, which was a vast amount of hay. I sensed that a voice, of someone also not seen in the dream, had suggested that there would be goats at this place we were currently headed to, and I heard my own words as though dismissing this incorrect notion someone else had made - 'yet there were none there'.

My only guess as to what this may relate to is money. Hay - 'to make hay', and my current preoccupation with worrying about needing money in the future. Which leaves the question of what the lack of goats in the place I'm heading to mean? Google dream distionaries suggest they may represent prosperity, for whatever reason. I was thinking/worrying about money/security in future when I drifted off. Perhaps it does relate to that. So perhaps the lack of goats could be seen as a lack of prosperity in future, or no need for a vast sum of money in future... I'm not sure.

Funny dream though, a massive ship load of hay and a lack of goats! Go figure.
comment_text: Well youre being shipped to the unknown with a stack of hay, to somewhere were "you" suppose there will be goats to feed this hay.* But there may not be*. Be careful with your overeaching hopes for whatever youre trying to sell that may not find an owner at the end. Perhaps it's just a little cautious warning against recklessness. Hope you find some place for all that hay.

comment_text:
The large flat shipping container type vessel is purposely designed to carry a large amount of products that can be loaded and unloaded quickly, perhaps the large ship represents and organisation you are connected with, eg church, business etc.
It sets out on a calm sea, suggesting that the opportune time is right to embark on this mission.
You do have a destination but it’s on an unseen shore, somewhere.
It’s not that you don’t know where you’re going because you do, it’s just at the moment unseen, and it’s not like it’s nowhere in fact it is somewhere, it is a real place you have set off towards.
It’s the way you are getting there that is the question not how because we know how, it’s on the big ship, organisation? You are sitting on top of the load because you are responsible to make sure this load of hay reaches its destination.
The how you reach and arrive suggests it will be by faith. The supplies and transport you are already a part of but the journey into the destination is unseen suggesting it is a journey by faith.
Note Abraham;
Heb 11:8
New International Version
By faith Abraham, when called to go to a place he would later receive as his inheritance, obeyed and went, even though he did not know where he was going.

Notice the “voice” that you “sense” of someone not seen in the dream as compared to the “words” of your own dismissing this “suggestion”
Notice the battle going on in your mind? You have set out on a journey with a load of supplies/hay and you are responsible to see that it arrives safely at this unseen destination. But now doubt sets in as we see your senses making suggestions to you that it’s perhaps a waste of time because there’s only goats at your destination again suggesting it’s a waste of good supplys just for a population/
group of goats? This creates doubt and the thoughts are activated by fear.
Let’s look at how you turn the battle, after you “sense” the “voice” you now “hear” “words”
This is very different because your words are containers also and they contain faith and with this faith you dismiss the “incorrect notion” that “someone else had made”
This is a battle going on in your mind you set out with confidence you set out with supplies for sheep and cattle because they are the ones who more likely feed on hay although goats eat hay they mainly forage not graze.
So the doubt that someone is trying to place inside your head is that the group you are sending supplies to are not even worthy of the supplies/vast amount of nutritious food. You correct this foolish notion with words not senseless notions.
You overcome your struggle to reach your destination where in fact where there are no goats.
So then if you have reached your destination who then is the vast amount of hay/nutritious food for?
We can identify the group since we know what animals eat hay and that is sheep and cattle rather than goats who are not there anyway.
John 21:17

The third time he said to him, "Simon son of John, do you love me?" Peter was hurt because Jesus asked him the third time, "Do you love me?" He said, "Lord, you know all things; you know that I love you." Jesus said, "Feed my sheep.

What we are seeing is a man taking a courageous journey by faith and in calm seas but buffeted by the senses rather than the waves.
Notice how it is faith that is required when venturing into things not seen.

Hebrews 11:1-6
King James Version
11 Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.

More understanding on the things which are seen and things which are not seen

3 Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God, so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear.

And again the struggle we face in the unseen realm

Ephes: 6:12.
New Living Translation
For we are not fighting against flesh-and-blood
enemies, but against evil rulers and authorities of the unseen world, against mighty powers in this dark world, and against evil spirits in the heavenly places.

post_text:
A dream from a few years ago, I was thinking about it recently, here is what I wrote down back then:
....

There were many who were living in the caves. I can't remember exactly why we all moved there, but it was to defend ourselves.

The girl asked me to help find her female friend. I liked the girl, I was interested in her, she was friendly and pretty -\-\ it would be a pleasure to help her out.

So we went inside the caves under the earth. As we went down under it became darker and darker, she started to become scared the deeper we went. I though that was cute, and started guiding her with more care.

We arrived at a dark chamber, where many there lay sleeping on the floor. It was there between the many lying bodies that her friend was to be found. We approached them. Using my cellphone light to try and find her.

I exclaimed to her silently "there she is!". She did not answer.

Immediately I head an attack -\-\ she attacked the sleeping girl! It wasn't an innocent girl trying to find her friend, it was an assassination! I was shocked, and didn't know what to do, it was completely dark and she was armed with a knife. I was at that second hesitating, about to attack her, when I woke up.
comment_text:
I find it interesting that people bring up dreams from so long ago, how they stay with us, and moreover, why they come back up into our consciousness atparticular points in time so long after the dream.

Did it just spring to mind, I guess? Or did something in particular prompt it can you recall?

Interesting dream. I guess from a Jungian perspective the girl/s could be seen as your anima symbols, and the dark underground perhaps your deep unconscious. The surprise assassin is an interesting twist. I love how dreams, though supposedly coming from our own minds, can spin a story and lead us to a point without us suspecting what's about to happen, then surprise us! It's like they don't come from our self at all.

If characters in dreams should be aspects of ourselves, then if the underground is the unconscious, the assassin motif leads me to consider a repellent/
repressed type behaviour.. a 'friend' being someone that they are related to, a repressed aspect of ourselves sure,bolised as someone dormant, sleeping.

I guess what you said at the start, that the people below ground, 'we were there to defend ourselves'. That too sounds like the way people judge against/
repress certain traits, as when people try to repress an agressive side to survive in polite society.

What are your thoughts on this old dream of yours?

post_text:
Dream from last night, seemed really Archetypal so thought I'd share while I recall it. Side note, I also seem to be randomly recalling previous dreams of previously forgotten throughout the days during lockdown at home alone.

A number of my recent dreams feature friends from high school, and a general feeling of my own low sense of self worth, inadequacy, failing in life, not living up to my potential..

The scene that was most vivid was the scene before I awoke.

I was at the edge of a river. The river wasn't among greenery, nor in open landscape, but was enclosed, steeped up both sides, perhaps by rock, the other side was vertical as a wall, the side I was on sloped more gradually down to the waters edge.

On the far side was a large wooden boat, its hull was standing tall many meters above the waters surface with many life size wooden figures on it like a carved sculpture, the boat was fixed in place, as were the wooden figures.

To my right, on the side of the river I was on, was a much smaller boat, and again there were wooden figurines which where positioned in a line as though walking toward the direction of the front of the boat, again fixed still, inanimate, those towards the back of the procession were above the water level, those towards the front progressively submerged as though depicting them walking into and beneath the water. Perhaps they were not actually on the little boat, or perhaps the boat too was submerged at the front, I think the boat was on top of the water, but the procession of wooden figurines were walking into the river in front of the little boat.

I noticed a woman unknown to me, who was wearing brown/red earthy colored clothes, and I sat down at the side of the river bank, sitting in the shallow water there, with a sense of some sexual connotation by doing so.
comment_text:
It strikes me as a comparison dream with the two sides of the river, the sloped vs the cliff, along with the small vs the large boat.

So given what you say about low self worth I am guessing that you are comparing yourself to others to measure your own worth?

But in so doing you are looking at still images - moments in time, the wooden still figure that doesn't take in the "full slope" of their being? You seem the at their peak, the cliff, the top, but not seeing their failures? The low points are submerged below the surface of the water while on your side you are seeing the whole slope, the dizzying highs, the terrifying lows, and the creamy middles.

Earth girl is inviting you to mix with the water, seems alchemical in nature. Inviting to mix conscious and unconscious, or body and spirit? I find it confusing but hopefully you could make sense of that?

post_text: Dreamt I was washing at school. The job was to wash the floor and tear off the wallpaper. I had a painting of a pelican on a blue background, a bit amateurish, but very nice (as if a talented 16-year-old had painted it) and the image felt very important and radiated something beautiful and neutral. I washed and tore off strips of wallpaper in large layers, and suddenly I had the picture in my hands and put it up against the window to see it better, but then a tow came and sucked the picture under the window and straight into a van that was located below . I saw the mother in the van let her daughter hold it up in front of her to take a picture of it (to post on Facebook as a fantastic case, I thought) and excitedly I turned to my colleagues and said what had happened. They explained to me that I had to keep tearing strips off the wall, and that we were having a bad time, and that I should concentrate on removing the stickers.
comment_text:
To me this is all about trying to change the way you are looking at things (change the wallpaper).

It seems like you have a pretty positive attitude and see things on this light, such as the amateurish artwork that you see beauty in - this is lost to you but you rejoice in it bringing joy to others. In sharing this point of view with others they seem to be not buoyed by this but try to bring you back to stripping you of this outlook?

post_text: i dreamed last night of being in a residential neighborhood and seeing a yellow dog. hanging out near me. it was some kind of an exotic variety. after that, I saw a lioness or some kind of large fenine. It came up to me. Me hand was in it's mouth and it was biting down. I understood that it was not to hurt me,. this was affectionate, so I sort of "snuggled" with it. In the dream, during this, I was thinking of when i grew up with house cat from my childhood that used to play-bite. I was vaguely conscious of other people watching this and i had communicated to them that the animal was only playing. While the feline tightened it's clamp on my hand/arm, though still not hurting, i still had the sense that thise thing could really do some damage on a whim, while I continued to snuggle.
comment_text:
Yellow Dog...what does yellow suggest to you. To me it could be craven, and dog, libido for a male.
Lion would be "pride" , hand in mouth. don't bite the hand that feeds you.

comment_text:
A Dog and a Lioness.
At first glance the dog is suggestive of mans best friend and even a helper, however we notice your dog is a yellow dog, suggesting a further meaning beyond just that of a friendly helper?
the word you use to further describe your dog is "exotic"
meaning; unusual and exciting because of coming from a far away especially a tropical country.
so now we have an exciting and unusual dog who comes from far away and is naturally meant to be helpful and friendly to people in your neighborhood, we don't yet know if this dog has a bite to it? (maybe by now you know who the yellow dog is?.
The Lioness of some kind.
The lioness meaning is the model for a woman, shes magnificent full of passion and beauty her presence is commanding and she protects her young. they are independent fierce loyal and brave and they are the primary hunters for their pride.
as with the dog who is given a descriptive yellow colour the lioness also is given us further description.
The biting down affectionately,
without hurting you seems to be what a lioness would do to lovingly carry her young with her teeth without hurting them.
The next thing we see is you snuggling into the lioness, shes a loving mother and you are her cub.
but now we see that this fierce mother figure who is protective of her cubs and bites without hurting has your hand in its mouth.and yet she is not biting to hurt, she was affectionate.
what is she doing? i
It does seem she is leading you? its possible that you have become a dog handler now your lioness is handling you in the right direction perhaps. you can be sure of this as compared with the exotic dog where you don't really know what to expect? the idea i get here is that i wouldn't be too trusting to allow the yellow dog to have your hand in its mouth?
this affectionate scene reminds you of the house cat perhaps your real mother who used to do the same thing to play bite while all the while protecting you.
you are conscious of other people watching, perhaps they think the treatment you are getting is over the top but you assure them its quite ok.
at the last we see the lioness tightening her grip on you you but still not hurting you.
so here it is its a "struggle" for you and as you continue to struggle your lioness continues to tighten her hold on your arm.
the yellow dog in your dream is supposed to be friendly and helpful however this dog has not displayed any of these loving attributes at all, unlike your lioness who has done a wonderful job of loving you and looking after you.

post_text:
I had a dream this morning that my sister and my dog were in grave danger? I found my sister lying on the ground, conscious, and with feeling down her leg into her toes but unable to move with a ring of blood around her neck and no one would tell me what happened to her. Also my dog was in trouble and no where to be found.

It’s back burner made me sad all day? / Simaltaneously made me grateful it wasn’t real all day.
comment_text:
I wonder could the sister represent a part of you that has been attacked or savaged by a "best friend" character? The blood around the throat sounds like a "bloody" issue based around communication; as a result the friend can't be found or has disappeared?

Maybe that it's a sister rather than you that's attacked could be an unconscious part of you perhaps?

But then again being your own dog the whole thing could be internal? Loyalty not being able to be found or something because of the injured communication issue?

post_text:
Dream 4/17/21

Came to discover that I was being asked to participate in a wedding, and I came to find out that it was my wife, or someone like her, getting married at the church my ex-wife and I used to attend. There was an apartment full of my ex-wife and her siblings, but they weren’t her real siblings. They were in the process of moving out of the apartment. I was there, frantically going from person to person, trying to figure out what was going on. It seemed to everyone like the most natural thing in the world, and my vehement protest was viewed as outlandish and inappropriate. I was distraught and desperately tried to make them see. “What is going on!?”

Then I was riding a horse through a sort of natural area, a national park. I saw that some belts had been discarded. I picked one up like a whip. I rode my horse downhill. It was hilly country, with grass and water and a view of a far distant country at a lower elevation.

Then I was back at the apartment. There was a Asian person there, of ambiguous gender. I asked this person to come back to the bedroom with the aim of seducing them. They didn’t know what I wanted and they got uncomfortable and finally said “oh, for some reason I thought you wanted to...” then my ex-wife’s sister came back (but not the real one) and we looked out the back window to see that there was a small prototype fighter jet being worked on by a couple of people, a woman and some children. “Jet fuel?” I asked. “That would be your low-grade test fuel,” the sister replied matter-of-factly.
comment_text: Nice to hear you had a wedding to attend, which may symbolise the integration of a complex into the psyche if which you have no conscious idea. If not already integrated and known , perhaps the relationships with ex and Asian point the way, and low grade jet fuel a slow process.

post_text:
Had a strange dream I could use some help deciphering. Keep in mind I haven’t seen/spoken to these girls in years.

I was in the basement of my parents house, but different. It looked like when I was 6 years old, with lots of my old toys that had since been removed. There were also many TVs and electronics that were there that never had been. I had come down to work on them, but also to escape some rowdy party going on upstairs. A girl came down, who happened to be a girl I had a crush on back in high school, and she started talking to me. I did my best to ignore her and focus on my work, but I eventually started hesitantly talking back. Before I knew it, we were running around the basement, playing with toys, flinging ping pong balls at each other. We started to get closer and closer, though I kept my distance best I could. I began to desire her, and our lips kept getting closer, but I stopped myself each time because I knew she had a boyfriend. Two of her friends showed up, people I hadn’t gotten along with in real life, but got along fine with in the dream. Eventually i felt it was time to go, so I decided to say goodbye and end our game. One of my crush’s friends said to her, “would you like to steal a kiss before we go?” My crush looked at me, and we shared a soft peck on the lips. We paused, and then suddenly we were making out, and I was lifting her up in my arms and spinning her around. It was the happiest I’d been in a while. Then a voice said “time to go,” and I was sucked into darkness and woke up.
comment_text:
Seems like your subconscious is trying to tell you to be more assertive or confident. To take more action towards what you want and not be as hesitant.

Is there anything you are not actively pursuing that you know you want to/should pursue? It doesn't necessarily have to be a girl.

Maybe its time to go for that job promotion you've been thinking about?

comment_text: It sounds to me like your dream had a functional task to strengthen your memory of your childhood; perhaps important attitudes and perspectives that had been lost. You were down in the childhood basement avoiding the loud sound of the party upstairs and actively rewiring your connection to the past. This girl came up in the process and her less than friendly friends. You got to play with the old attraction and even repaired the uncomfortable discord with her friends, in a semi-lucid way, but that wasn't the primary purpose of the dream and had gone right to that sweet point of, "enough" and maybe "on the edge of distraction", so you were pulled up.

post_text:
Here’s my dream from last night and I’ll post my initial take in the comments:

I was with a group of men/new acquaintances (reminded me of a Mardi Gras krew) at a posh modern open air restaurant-like courtyard area, standing at a black bistro height table. All the surrounding buildings and courtyard walls were white. There were six of us and a television on a nearby wall was on and blaring some E-Entertainment type story about Dr Jordan B. Peterson. The TV announcer/host was commenting on “the JBP phenomena sweeping the country” and the voice asking the typical troupes; “Is Peterson misogynistic or not?”

We’re all enjoying light hearted banner and seem to be waiting for a dining table or something.

Suddenly, the HULK rushes up to our table and says “Me just want to bowl!” and pounds the edge of our round table causing a large piece to break off and I notice the table is made of concrete. Then HULK rushes a few yards away, grabs a bowling ball and flings it at some pins and they explode from the force as he nails a strike. I hear my sister say “That was so dangerous, someone could have been hurt.” and I think how it was just HULK having some rowdy fun. And I consider how I could tell her this and also realize how she would likely not be amenable to this view.

Then a waiter appears at our table to tell us the restaurant is ready for us and for us to get ready to prove we’re ready for them and then he yells “Go!” (Like someone shouting to begin a race.) We immediately pickup the table (we’re now handcuffed to it) and begin running with it. We’re all dressed in dark suits and white shirts and moving quickly, huffing and puffing, with the table between us that’s now rectangular, like a casket and I realize this is what we do to get into this restaurant. We must compete to be worthy to gain entrance.

We started in Los Angeles and we’re now in New Orleans and the voice over is saying this is the thing “sweeping the country” as we jog/run along one of the men grabs my right leg and pinches hard saying he’s going to hold on and rest and I say “the hell you are”and knock his hand away and then we have to climb a tall white wall (with a barred window at the top) with the concrete table and get our table/casket over in order to gain entry and we do and we make it and we collapse with our table in an outdoor courtyard as I realize the restaurant and view is exactly like the place we just began.
comment_text:

First group is your secret group of 6 men aligned with the Madigras group who display and exhibit festival platforms publicly in the open air, in the streets to interact with the public.

Second group is Jordan Peterson’s public group using tv and online internet platforms to interact with the public.

This interaction is achieved through the tv host who through their tv programs, platforms scrutinise his publicity and his idea’s.

4th group are the church’s, one of which you also belong to as you yourself say “irregular Methodist” may be seen in your dream as the “restaurant” which offers exclusive membership asking potential members to “ prove themselves upon joining. The other church group is obviously the Roman Catholic Church who are behind the Mardigras group.

What’s being played out here is the interaction between these groups and yourself since you are in fact a member of all of the groups.
Perhaps the schism created for you is the oathes you have to gain membership to the secret 6 man group which of course the Methodist group would be opposed to.

It’s basically a public trial in the “open air”Madigras street festivals and tv, online and street platforms. Peterson group “sweeping phenomena”

The bistro is a fixed menu of counter food, the restaurant Is more food ordered to taste.
The bistro is cheaper the restaurant is dearer.
The bistro bar is high and black.
The restaurant walls are white

Your secret group uses the troupes and outdoor festivals, Peterson’s group the tv and internet. Both groups are trying to get their message across.

So how are the both groups going so far?
I notice that Peterson’s group has a voice in the restaurant, the tv on their whitewall of the church.
Your group is still outside in the bistro, waiting for a decision from the restaurant of whom Peterson has a say. He is inside the restaurant you are still outside in the bistro in the Court yard of public opinion, street festivals, tv and internet platforms similar to the platforms used of by the troupes in the mardigras. This is all seen as entertainment “blaring out from the tv” and the troupes platforms as they entertain with their “throws” the beads designed to arouse the public.
Since Peterson has a voice already in the restaurant and your group doesn’t the tv host comes out with a trick question asking The typical troupes, “is JB Peterson misogynistic or not”

This is a cunning question ..
He is being asked if women are free to do what they want? It seems like a trick question? If Peterson says they are not free to do what they want then he is judged as misogynistic but if he says they are free to make their own decision then why can’t they do what they want also? And so the debate is played out in public.
Is this question an attaché to the original question at hand, if the men’s group are wanting membership o the church restaurant then so also the women should also be accepted as embers to do as they want?

post_text:
Here’s my dream from last night and I’ll post my initial take in the comments:

I was with a group of men/new acquaintances (reminded me of a Mardi Gras krew) at a posh modern open air restaurant-like courtyard area, standing at a black bistro height table. All the surrounding buildings and courtyard walls were white. There were six of us and a television on a nearby wall was on and blaring some E-Entertainment type story about Dr Jordan B. Peterson. The TV announcer/host was commenting on “the JBP phenomena sweeping the country” and the voice asking the typical troupes; “Is Peterson misogynistic or not?”

We’re all enjoying light hearted banner and seem to be waiting for a dining table or something.

Suddenly, the HULK rushes up to our table and says “Me just want to bowl!” and pounds the edge of our round table causing a large piece to break off and I notice the table is made of concrete. Then HULK rushes a few yards away, grabs a bowling ball and flings it at some pins and they explode from the force as he nails a strike. I hear my sister say “That was so dangerous, someone could have been hurt.” and I think how it was just HULK having some rowdy fun. And I consider how I could tell her this and also realize how she would likely not be amenable to this view.

Then a waiter appears at our table to tell us the restaurant is ready for us and for us to get ready to prove we’re ready for them and then he yells “Go!” (Like someone shouting to begin a race.) We immediately pickup the table (we’re now handcuffed to it) and begin running with it. We’re all dressed in dark suits and white shirts and moving quickly, huffing and puffing, with the table between us that’s now rectangular, like a casket and I realize this is what we do to get into this restaurant. We must compete to be worthy to gain entrance.

We started in Los Angeles and we’re now in New Orleans and the voice over is saying this is the thing “sweeping the country” as we jog/run along one of the men grabs my right leg and pinches hard saying he’s going to hold on and rest and I say “the hell you are”and knock his hand away and then we have to climb a tall white wall (with a barred window at the top) with the concrete table and get our table/casket over in order to gain entry and we do and we make it and we collapse with our table in an outdoor courtyard as I realize the restaurant and view is exactly like the place we just began.

But as you begin to slow down with the hard work which you hadn’t anticipated the remembrance table begins to change shape to that of a coffin?

Notice again the allusion to how we must wait patiently or the masters return and not grow dry o good works.
Now you find you are told to prove yourselves by keeping the agreement which you are bound to do since you are handcuffed to it by your own words perhaps (oath) a binding agreement that will produce proof and are forced to accept the conditions that you signed up for but clearly did not expect. How wonderfull the master has appeared to you although you don’t recognise him and this is the purpose of the trial that when you are genuine and obedient your eyes will be opened and you will see him as he is. Then you will understand.
This is the predicament your group find yourselves in”
“and I REALISE NOW”look your eyes are beginning to open you begin to understand the higher purpose of learning to serve.
“that this is what we must do to get into this restaurant”
. We must compete to prove that we are worthy.
Compete is an allusion to the bible again where is says that we must STRIVE to enter in through the gate that is STRAIT.
Now this is such a predicament here because the restaurant group cannot force people to keep the covenant and the men’s group having agreed to keep that covenant soon realise they can’t!

post_text:
Interpret this:

I was in my sisters house (which in my dream was my house) and a wolf walked in from a storm outside and I pretended to be asleep in the bed because I was afraid it would kill me. The wolf laid down and slept half on top of me. I remember the feeling of being afraid of the wolf despite it not doing anything threatening. I managed to wiggle my hand free and text my sister that I needed her to come and shoot this wolf. She came and shot the wolf dead.

Weird! Lol
comment_text: The wolf sounds like it's acting like an "elephant in the room". Maybe there's something your subconscious wants you to address in your life or relationships that may be bothering but you don't want to address it directly.

comment_text:
Wolves belong to a vast family and care for one another
I can only guess because I don’t know the dynamic but let’s look at a few things that might piece it together for you?
It’s your sisters house the female wolves are what hold the vast family together since there is only one breeding pair.
There’s a storm outside a tumultuous reaction, uproar or controversy.
And from that storm/argument the perhaps disbanded wolf seeks refuge and comfort with you?
You think the wolf wants to kill you?
You know what’s going on because you are awake you only pretend to be asleep Eg not know what’s going on.
You pretend to not know what’s going on because you are afraid. Afraid of what?
From here it’s just a wild guess but is it possible that you somehow had something to do with this storm/ argument going on at your sisters house? You don’t want the injured wolf to know so you pretend you don’t know. You think he’s going to kill you but he’s not he’s looking for comfort for him and you “ he half lays on you”
Again it’s hard to piece together but it seems that you don’t want to be accountable in this matter handing the wolf straight back to your sister this time we see the violent reaction of the storm in the final shooting of the wolf caught between 2 sisters???
I note that it is you that needed her your sister to shoot/ control this wolf?
To shoot can mean to kill or wound
You should be able to work this out from here

Maybe you're getting repeat symbols because you are not reacting to them. Eg water could mean interface of conscious and unconscious mind, the road or travel the present position of the psyche as it pursues integration of complexes. post_text:
In my dream I saw a blonde girl. She was cute; not the most attractive person, but for some reason she appealed to me more than many beauties.
She was dressed in a very simple way, her clothes were light blue and pink.
She was a magician. She invited me to join a club she belonged to herself. In this club magicians could meet, talk, spend time together. I was tempted to join, but I was not ready to commit myself, because that would mean I'd have to attend the first meeting immediately, so I just said I would consider it for next time.
She was slightly disappointed.
comment_text:
The Blonde girl is a magician illusionist, sorcerer, witch, enchanter, charmer, satanist, siren to name but a few.
You say she was cute: attractive in a dainty way, appealing, delightful, charming. Acquired some cute mannerisms etc
The blond girl is in fact a young woman this is what you find appealing, she’s not a Marilyn Monroe neither is she a dumb blonde( as the saying goes) but she is a young woman and innocent and the blonde hair represents her fair skin. To you you have found a woman untarnished by worldly living. She is appealing because with you she will continue to grow untainted such as the many beauties you refer to. These beauties also have many qualities such as shape, colour or form that pleases the senses. Notice your young woman is fair this is what really appeals to you rather than exotic colours etc. You are not so much looking to please the outward senses rather you are looking for inner content and satisfaction. However in this case this young girl is a witch/ magician.
Even the way she is dresses is not loud or outlandish, the colours are there but again they are fair colours again suggesting an innocence “she is dressed in a simple way” there are many meanings for the colours however the simplistic meaning may suggest this simple young woman is thinking of marriage and a family the blue for a boy the pink for a girl if this is the case then marriage and children appeal more to you than temporary relationships.
She was a Magician, as described a witch an illusionist. This sweet young girl is casting her spell over you, beware!
Now that she has got your attention she takes her next step, not to come home and meet the family, no, but to join her club, the Magicians club, it’s here where she wants to marry you in, beware again!
She belonged to this club not just a member but “belonging”sugg
esting something far more eg a generational thing with rules and codes etc, a place to socialise with other like minded people to discuss methods to ply their trade. A place to “meet” this is what she wants a place to meet, a place to join to get her.j
YOU ARE TEMPTED to join. Please note very clearly your dream has turned from appealing to TEMPTATION.
You were not ready because you were not ready to commit. You were tempted to just go there no strings attached. The strings of attachment on the first meeting would obviously mean having your name published in the membership and first of all learning the new magical skills as an induction process of which you probably don’t agree with.
You said you would consider it the next time meaning that the temptation for the young woman is still there, unfortunately you can’t seperate the appealing young woman from the magical witch.
She is a little disappointed meaning she will try again. BEWARE!
Proverbs 7
New International Version
Warning Against the Adulterous Woman
1 My son, keep my words
and store up my commands within you.
2 Keep my commands and you will live;
guard my teachings as the apple of your eye.
3 Bind them on your fingers;
write them on the tablet of your heart.
4 Say to wisdom, “You are my sister,”
and to insight, “You are my relative.”
5 They will keep you from the adulterous woman,
from the wayward woman with her seductive words.
6 At the window of my house
I looked down through the lattice.
7 I saw among the simple,
I noticed among the young men,
a youth who had no sense.
8 He was going down the street near her corner,
walking along in the direction of her house
9 at twilight, as the day was fading,
as the dark of night set in.
10 Then out came a woman to meet him,
dressed like a prostitute and with crafty intent.
11 (She is unruly and defiant,
her feet never stay at home;
12 now in the street, now in the squares,
at every corner she lurks.)
13 She took hold of him and kissed him
and with a brazen face she said:
14 “Today I fulfilled my vows,
and I have food from my fellowship offering at home.
15 So I came out to meet you;
I looked for you and have found you!
16 I have covered my bed
with colored linens from Egypt.
17 I have perfumed my bed
with myrrh, aloes and cinnamon.
18 Come, let’s drink deeply of love till morning;
let’s enjoy ourselves with love!
19 My husband is not at home;
he has gone on a long journey.
20 He took his purse filled with money
and will not be home till full moon.”
21 With persuasive words she led him astray;
she seduced him with her smooth talk.
22 All at once he followed her
like an ox going to the slaughter,
like a deer[a] stepping into a noose[b]
23 till an arrow pierces his liver,
like a bird darting into a snare,
little knowing it will cost him his life.
24 Now then, my sons, listen to me;
pay attention to what I say.
25 Do not let your heart turn to her ways
or stray into her paths.
26 Many are the victims she has brought down;
her slain are a mighty throng.
27 Her house is a highway to the grave,
leading down to the chambers of death.

post_text:
I've been having this dream where someone is trying to break into my apartment through the front door.

It usually begins with me hearing a noise and getting out of bed to go inspect what's going on. As I reach to make sure the door is locked is when I realize it is an intruder trying to get in.

At first, all I had to do was double check that the door is locked and the intruder would leave.

But the intruder is becoming bolder and stronger with each occurance.

For instance; the next time the intruder left after I told him that I am prepared to fight.
Then, I had to say that I have a weapon that I'm not afraid to use (I didnt have one though).
Then, I would say that the police were on the phone.

Etc.

This slowly escelated to the point that he started to break the locks and begin to open the door but I'd always be able to force it shut.

But with each occurance he is getting stronger.

Recently, once the dream would begin I would know what was about to happen and would prepare by wedging a 2x4 against the door and a wall. This was able to greatly assist me in the strugle of keeping the door closed for a while; although it was still a hard fought battle that would usually last several minutes.

Last night he broke the 2x4. Seeing the 2x4 break scared me enough to give me a surge of adrenaline that was able to provide me with the strength to force the door closed.

However, I do not know how much longer I can keep the door closed on my own and I am running out of ideas.

.......
Other details:

The dreams always occur at night in my current apartment.

I do not know who this man is but did get to peer around the partially opened door and finally catch a glimpse of him.

He is 30-40 years old, ~6'4" and 230+ pounds.

He is dressed in a dirty blue jumpsuit, the kind that a car mechanic would wear.

He has not said anything and I do not know what he wants.

Once the door closes is when I will usually wake up with my heart pounding, ready to fight, and sometimes sweating.

I used to immediately get up and check the locks in real life, but I do not anymore.

This has been going on for probably close to 2 years but the frequency has been increasing as of late (approximately once every 2 weeks)

Any thoughts? Insights? Ideas? Questions?

Thank you in advance!
comment_text: Do you know your dreaming? If so, ask him what he wants. If you don't know your dreaming, imagine the dream in your imagination in detail and keep telling yourself that it is a dream. Next time you may remember and then have a chance to ask him what he represents. Sometimes in my dreams I have done this and they come right out and tell me. Other times not, but always worth a shot.

post_text:
I've been having this dream where someone is trying to break into my apartment through the front door.

It usually begins with me hearing a noise and getting out of bed to go inspect what's going on. As I reach to make sure the door is locked is when I realize it is an intruder trying to get in.

At first, all I had to do was double check that the door is locked and the intruder would leave.

But the intruder is becoming bolder and stronger with each occurance.

For instance; the next time the intruder left after I told him that I am prepared to fight.
Then, I had to say that I have a weapon that I'm not afraid to use (I didnt have one though).
Then, I would say that the police were on the phone.

Etc.

This slowly escelated to the point that he started to break the locks and begin to open the door but I'd always be able to force it shut.

But with each occurance he is getting stronger.

Recently, once the dream would begin I would know what was about to happen and would prepare by wedging a 2x4 against the door and a wall. This was able to greatly assist me in the strugle of keeping the door closed for a while; although it was still a hard fought battle that would usually last several minutes.

Last night he broke the 2x4. Seeing the 2x4 break scared me enough to give me a surge of adrenaline that was able to provide me with the strength to force the door closed.

However, I do not know how much longer I can keep the door closed on my own and I am running out of ideas.

well if you don't have an actual fear of someone in your awaken life invading you, it would probably be your own shadow trying to break through, maybe this person trying to break into your place represents all that you hate of persons of your own sex, usually persons in ones dream of same-sex do represent one's own shadow, and the harder one tries to keep one's ideals not deflated from the ordinary or not so admirable sides and bad sides of one's character, the shadow of the more uglier kind will knock on one's door... we all have both sides and too high ideals ends up being threatened from ones shadow...or even invaded... of cause if you have some scary male-type invading you in real life this might be a totally other problem-constel

comment_text: I am reading Maps of Meaning (Chapter 2) where he talks a lot about right and left brain functions. You mentioned that you are a left brain thinker. The right brain is associated with exploration of the unknown. It is also associated with negative emotion (like fear). This fires up the amygdala. We get in that fight or flight mode. (Excuse my simplistic rendering of JP’s work). I thought of how artists – especially writers – are associated with that negative emotion – the tortured writer. They are constantly exploring chaos and the unknown. And this process fires up the fear and the amygdala gets enlarged. (That’s my theory after reading JP). Anyway, I was thinking maybe you could approach your dream – the chaos – with more the attitude of exploration and curiosity – rather than fear. Invite it in – in a way that arouses curiosity rather than fear. It is coming through the front door after all. Perhaps your sub conscious is trying to get some important images through to you, with which your left brain is unfamiliar. You might try doing more right brain activities that get it into shape – so to speak. The idea is more about a shift in attitude and how you confront or approach the images in your dreams. The mythological story of the hero is about facing your fears (chaos, the unknown, the dragon) and there you will find your greatest treasure. How can you be the hero? Is there a dragon you are not facing? Is it really a dragon – or just the fear of the unknown? BTW I am a classic right brain thinker – and a writer, so I naturally connect patterns and images. Hope it helps you be the hero in your dreams – and real life.

Recurring dreams means that it's a recurring problem(s) in your life. Is it every night you dream the dream, or only in-between?

post_text: I have no interpretation for what just happened in my dream. I had sliced 1-2 inch lines all over my body, slanting in random directions, and inserted fractions of leaves in each one. The idea was that this was important and should be done. I don't remember why. There was no blood or gore. Minimal pain. (I have been playing with an arrowhead and a plastic tablecloth the previous evening). The torn leaves were somewhat thinner than kaffir lime leaves. After they had set flat with my skin between its layers for some time, they were to be removed. And I started removing them by reopening the cuts, and using my fingernails to get a grip. I had removed them from my left side, when I took a break for some reason and thougt, "I hope these don't heal into my right side", though without real anxiety. There was nothing gory under the surface. Just slightly more intimate layers of skin. There was pain. I don't recall cutting or removing them from my neck or torso, but definitely my arms and legs. I have no idea what to make of it but it was a very striking experience. Any ideas?
comment_text:
Fascinating.

On the symbolism of the left and right side, I find it interesting that Jung has said the right side represents the unconscious.

I'm not sure that gets you much closer to an interpretation of the dream, but it's one aspect that I'd say is a safe bet in its symbolic meaning.

comment_text: You seek relief from the discomfort caused by your asymmetry: the oblique adhesions in the connective tissue under your skin that have formed over time from the angular holding pattern of a strength differential between your left and right hip and shoulder. The frustration you feel towards western medicine for its failure to address the body as a mechanical device-\-\a pressurized free-standing structure under gravity-\-\draws you ever towards natural healing techniques. Though you have been taking some steps in this direction through postural focus, your unconscious is telling you that your attempts are not in fact strengthening your weak left side but instead are further strengthening your overbearing right. The way forward is to first learn to disengage old habits of movement before implementing new patterns. You can find the text of FM Alexander's 'Man's Supreme Inheritance' easily online; it is public domain. But if you desire to consult a shaman in this matter, one is readily available.

post_text:
Have any of you ever tried 5-HTP?

I've been experimenting with it for the probably close to a year by cycling on and off, stacking it with other supplements, varying dosages, etc.

While I haven't noticed a significant difference during the day I have very clearly noticed a difference in regards to my dreams.

Ever since I was little, I usually haven't been able to remember my dreams in the morning. But on the rare occasions that I do it is typically one scene played out that is closely related to some significant event going on in my waking life. The dreams are pretty simple and feel as if they last only a few minutes. I have even experienced having the same dream multiple times for months at a time until I was able to slay the dragon in my waking life that was causing those reoccurring dreams. Usually it is me having a conversation with someone or me performing a simple task. I've always contributed this to my subconscious trying to help me out when I was under a great amount of stress or confused about something important.

However, I have noticed that on days when I take 5-HTP(especially when I take it later in the day), my dreams that night are comprised of multiple very complex scenes and a storyline that can be several days in length. These dreams are also not tightly correlated to present challenges I am going through in real life (like my dreams usually are) but can relate to past experiences and even other things that I haven't quite figured out yet.

My dreams are still fairly realistic in that I'm not able to fly or see things that couldn't happen in real life; but instead of just having a conversation with someone for a few minutes, I am having to work my way through multiple scenarios and make many decisions. They are also always very different from one another and I have not noticed any reoccurring dreams on days when I take 5-HTP, so far. Thus, instead of waking up, being able to remember my dream, and fairly quickly being able to think about what the meaning behind it was; I have to spend several hours if not days thinking about it (which I find enjoyable) but even then I am not always able to figure it out at all.

This could just be a placebo, but I honestly don't think a placebo could get me to go from being able to remember 10% of my dreams to remembering 90% of my dreams.

I have read online that people attribute more vivid dreams while taking 5-HTP to the increase in serotonin that it could cause; but I also have experimented with various similar supplements (and even take Adderall regularly) that also impact serotonin levels and have not noticed any differences in my dreams that compares to what 5-HTP seems to be capable of.

Anyway, just something I find very interesting that I figured I share here and see if others have experienced this too. I do recommend trying it for yourself since they are pretty cheap on Amazon and relatively harmless. The brand I have been using is "Doctors Best" but I'm not sure if the brand will make any difference.

Thanks
comment_text:
Yeah, that's top-lobster juice right? Makes you more confident? 🦞 *clack clack*

I don't know if I ever noticed difference in dreams. I don't think I ever took it consistently. I'm going to try now though!

I may be completely wrong here, but at night doesn't it form melatonin, and in the day serotonin. If so, it'll be the melatonin that makes the unconscious manifest. Meditation teachers sometimes suggest to practice in the night to take advantage of the naturally higher levels of melatonin in our system, which increases the likelihood of mystical experiences, aka the unconscious coming into our perceptual awareness.

Yh, apparently serotonin is a precursor to melatonin. 5-htp will produce serotonin during the day, but melatonin at night, naturally.

post_text:
Hello everyone, it's been awhile.
I just want to share my niece's dream that she shared with me. So it's about seeing her grandmother (my mother) who recently died. From the specific scene which describes as somewhat a "rapture" in the bible, she said she first saw Jesus above and the Virgin Mother, Mary in dark clouds. Then after that, my mother appeared and talked to her, asking her how she is. They talked for awhile, and also asked her how's been doing, and she said she is doing fine. Then for some reason my mother is trying to insert her finger on her mouth. When my niece asked why she is doing that, my mother told her that she just don't want to change her voice, whatever that means. Then she shared something like a message to my niece, that we must all be careful and take extra care for something that might happen in the future. And then a white door appeared with gold embellishments, and large bell rang. When it rang, my mother told her that she must return because Moses is waiting for them. And reminded her again that we must all be careful. Then she woke up.

I would love to hear your thoughts on what could this dream is trying to communicate to my niece, or to our family. When I asked her what she felt during her dream, she said she was happy that she got to saw her grandmother. I'm not sure if this can be related or something, but from all the grandchildren, she was the only one who never got to see my mother during the wake since she just got birth during the time to her third child, wasn't able also to attend the last day at the cremation.

Thank you in advance to all who will be sharing their thoughts 😊

post_text:
An integration of the Shadow?

Hello all,

I got a recommendation for this group after posting this dream I had in another Jordan Peterson related group:
A few days ago I had a dream/nightmare. I want to share it with you and hopefully get some ideas as to what it might mean. The reason I feel it’s appropriate to post here is that I really would like Jordan Peterson’s take on it. He talks a lot about Jung and archetypes - although I haven’t read extensively on the subject I am very interested in the ideas and I think my dream has some connection to one’s shadow. Also Peterson has talked a lot about dreams and what they might be trying to communicate.
To give you an idea right away, it was a nightmare BUT I was the villain.
Most times when I have a nightmare I am running away from evil, or in some other way trying to escape evil. This time I was evil running away from heroes.
The dream:
I'm driving a car in a world I am familiar with, it's a video game world, more specifically the Grand Theft Auto world. (I’ve never really played the game by the way, IF I played it, my time was spent driving around legally, not even speeding. So it’s safe to say I haven’t really played it)
I realize the cops are chasing me, no small amount of cops, cars and policemen on foot. I'm an evil man (woman in real life btw which is interesting as well), a criminal. I drive fast and recklessly and I’m running through several doors, up and down stairs….
Soon I've gotten rid of the cops, they're not after me anymore. I'm in an empty house that’s still being built, it’s basically still just an iron structure (similar to the one in The Dark Knight when Batman and Joker battle)…
I'm not alone, Aragorn (Lord of the Rings) is there fighting me and he has a sword, I also have a sword. We are hanging on iron pillars and fencing. I get a hold of his sword and I kick him off the building, I watch him fall while I hang there.
When he hits the ground I look up at the building, there I see millions of faces / heads on the building - like manikin heads.
I instantly know it’s me, my face, but instead of it being my own real life face, I'm the Joker (Joker 2020 version) with a disgusting grin on its face. (I loved the Joker 2020 movie btw).
I wake up and I do not want to fall asleep again, I escaped, I won, but I'm evil.
I have the same feeling as when I have a nightmare where something evil is chasing me. Usually when I have a nightmare I wake up right before someone catches me, or something bad is just about to happen. But now I "won" and THEN I woke up.
I found it incredibly interesting to dream that I was the "bad guy". I've never experienced this before.
I am actually very excited about this and really want to know what it might mean. Obviously the explanation lies in details of my life which I will have to dig into to realise exactly what this means, BUT what I wanted to do was to post this here and get a more general discussion going about what it means when you dream that you’re the “bad guy”.
comment_text:

but I see another law at work in me, waging war against the law of my mind and making me a prisoner of the law of sin at work within me.

Looking at your dream again we see your villain is running away from the heroes, he’s been caught out now whereas before he/she was lurking in the unseen darkness gently deceiving you at first but now your dream has exposed the villain within and he’s on the run, he wants to hide from all this light you are subjecting him to, but he can’t because you’ve reached a point where you are determined to chase down this villain. So on one hand your villain is become exposed on the other hand you are not comfortable at realising there is actually a villain lurking within whose purpose is to bring you into captivity and steal your vehicle. This is what we need to do.
“I’m driving a car in a world I’m familiar with”
The car here is probably your outward every Day body/vehicle and you are a driven type of person seems obvious. You have the drive to go forward in your immediate world whatever that is eg business/ sports whatever? You are driven!
In your dream your world identifies with grand theft auto? From memory elite vehicles have been shopped and stolen for a specific customer who really likes and want that style of vehicle, they are willing to pay for it.
Here’s the thing, it does seem like you are an elite person of sorts your vehicle holds a special place of interest designed to move fast in the company of elite vehicles similar to yourself. You have perfected the design and you are now sought after by others within your familiar life. But now we see the villain entering in to steal away your vehicle just like in grand theft auto where the owner has perfected his ability to design his life the way he wants and make his vehicle streamlined to suit his own particular purpose only to find to his dismay the villain the thief who has done no such work but simply comes along to steal your car, your streamlined vehicle that was designed by you to suit a specific purpose.
So now we can see you as the hero and the villain, the hero as one who puts in all the design work and produces a streamlined vehicle and you also as the villain want into to steal the car away simply to sell it to the highest bidder (grand theft auto)
You are perhaps young and don’t understand this concept, your streamlined vehicle was made that way by vigilant had work according to the law of your mind. The villain is the thief who see’s the beautiful vehicle and has done nothing to make it great and elite and simply steals it from you, look at the villain here..

New International Version
The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
So far your dream is showing you to take good care of the vehicle you have produced because the thief is always looking to steal it from you.
You are not the thief as you so describe yourself “ you do not normally speed etc because you are a careful and thoughtful and you don’t break the law you are not not reckless with your vehicle, each of us need to at some time need to contend. with this situation because we are so given to conditioning ourselves we don’t notice other thoughts creeping in, and this I bother thief creeps into your life, while you are busy conditioning yourself you don’t notice him gradually sneaking in.By stealing your vehicle (GTA) he will only destroy what you have created. Here we see your villain warring against your good mind trying to derail you and eventually sell your vehicle for gain rather than use it for what you originally designed it for.
